title: Coming up: Riot will permanently add URF. Acessable for only $19.95!
body:
Next year you will also earn honor as normal. But the Honor Rewards at the end of the season will now be avaible for $5! 

You just dashed as Aatrox, and you wanna dash again! No problem! Microtransactions are now added in game. You can purchase additional dashes for only $1 each!
You just died, and don't wanna wait a whole minute to respawn? Fear not! Purchase 5 Instantly Revives for the cheap price of $6.99!
